Pre-Game Insights: Javier Aguirre is set to make his debut as the coach of Mexico against New Zealand on September 7, 2024.
The match marks the start of a new process for Mexico leading up to the 2026 World Cup.
The game could also mark a generational change in the Mexican national team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place at the Rose Bowl.
The game will start at 19:00 hours, Mexico City time.
Television coverage for the match will be available on Canal 5, Canal 7, TUDN, and Vix.
